*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to J. H. Bell. January 1, 1828, Suggesting ticket for election of first ayuntamiento of San Felipe.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-01-1828">Jany 1-1828*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr Sir,*/p*
*p*I am happy to find myself once more amongst my large *person_mentioned*family*/person_mentioned* after so long an absence*/p*
*p*On the *date_mentioned n="02-03-1828">3 */date_mentioned*and *date_mentioned n="02-04-1828">4 of Feby next*/date_mentioned* the genl election comes on in the *location_mentioned*several districts*/location_mentioned* for one *person_mentioned*Alcalde*/person_mentioned*, two *person_mentioned*regidores */person_mentioned*or *person_mentioned*aldermen */person_mentioned*and one *person_mentioned*sindico procurador */person_mentioned*for the *location_mentioned*whole colony*/location_mentioned*—these *person_mentioned*officers */person_mentioned*compose the *person_mentioned*Ayuntamiento */person_mentioned*or *person_mentioned*municipal corporation*/person_mentioned*—great power is given to this *person_mentioned*corporation */person_mentioned*by the laws, and much depends on getting in good and intelligent *person_mentioned*men*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Kinny */person_mentioned*has positively refused to serve as *person_mentioned*Alcalde*/person_mentioned*, and I think that *person_mentioned*Ira Ingram*/person_mentioned* will be the best we can get—he is compelled to live in this *location_mentioned*place */location_mentioned*and it will not be as injurious to him to be absent from *location_mentioned*home*/location_mentioned* as some others—in my opinion he is well qualified for the office and will do credit to the *location_mentioned*colony */location_mentioned*The *person_mentioned*Ayuntamiento */person_mentioned*must meet once a month at this place which will be a little inconvenient for those who live at a distance*/p*
*p*I think *person_mentioned*J. H. Bell*/person_mentioned*—*person_mentioned*Wm Morton*/person_mentioned* and *person_mentioned*L. K. Kinny*/person_mentioned* ought to be the two *person_mentioned*regidores */person_mentioned*and the *person_mentioned*sindico Procurador*/person_mentioned*—or if either of these will not serve *person_mentioned*M. B. Nuckols*/person_mentioned* who lives here and is a very good and intelligent man.*/p*
*p*The nearer they could be elected to this place the better for they ought to meet at least once a month and sometimes of tener, and there is no kind of compensation allowed to them by law—Should the *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned*be unable to act from sickness or death etc the *person_mentioned*alderman*/person_mentioned* who had the highest vote takes his place which makes it still more important to elect good men—*person_mentioned*Rawson Alley*/person_mentioned* has also been spoken of and he would make a good one also *person_mentioned*T. M. Duke*/person_mentioned*, If you do not wish the appointment (which I presume you do not) for it will put you to great trouble owing to the distance you live from here, I think that *person_mentioned*Kinny */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Morton */person_mentioned*for *person_mentioned*regidores */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Nuckols */person_mentioned*for *person_mentioned*Sindico Procurador*/person_mentioned* will be the best we can get—Write me your opinion on the subject and wheither *person_mentioned*Ingram */person_mentioned*for Alcalde—*person_mentioned*Kinny */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Morton*/person_mentioned* for regidores and Nuckols for Sindico Procurador, will suit the *person_mentioned*people */person_mentioned*in that *location_mentioned*quarter*/location_mentioned*—if not write me what ticket you think will suit them—let us try and be united and harmonious in this election I have sent the *person_mentioned*Alcalde */person_mentioned*of that *location_mentioned*district */location_mentioned*full instructions on the subject of conducting the Election—the forms etc and a *location_mentioned*circular*/location_mentioned* which will give you an idea of the nature of the new system—*/p*
*p*remember me to *person_mentioned*Mrs Bell*/person_mentioned*, it is a long time since I have seen her and I feel anxious to visit you and see you all once more. When the election is over I shall be free and will come and see you—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S F, Austin*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*[Addressed:]*person_mentioned*Mr. J. H Bell*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Lower Settlement*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
